name: labubu beanie
notes:
crochet your own adorable little beanies for your labubus! this ribbed, no-sew design has an opening for the ears and works up quickly!

find the **free pattern** **[here][1]**!

watch the **video tutorial [here][2]**!

the written pattern uses lightweight level 3 yarn, but modifications are written out for worsted and fingering yarn too!

use the hashtag **#labububeanie** when you post your projects on social media!


  [1]: http://www.allaboutami.com/labubu-beanie/
  [2]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dtktnrzanxw&t=6s
